data.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
data.message:
Merge pull request #2 from methylDragon/patch-1

Remove extraneous dependencies

data.author: methylDragon
data.message:
Remove extraneous dependencies

The extra OpenCL dependencies are covered by the other two. And it's important to remove them because otherwise the buildfarm will fail because the other keys don't exist in `rosdep`.

Remember to make a new release tag!

data.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
data.message:
cpplint and cppcheck utilities and OpenCL header

Vitis Library headers are left 'as they are' for compatibility
purposes. Future efforts will aim to push the headers to a
separated package in alignment with  Vitis_Libraries tree.

Signed-off-by: Víctor Mayoral Vilches <v.mayoralv@gmail.com>
